channel.title: cat-Allon Wuta Mai Ƙōnāwa on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-Allon Wuta Mai Ƙōnāwa on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn11759 in Hausa
item.description: Da sūnan Allah, madawwami, mafi girma. A gaskiya, zūkācen aminnai nā tōyēwa cikin wutar rabuwa: Inā ƙyalƙyalin hasken fuskarka, yā kai abun ƙaunar dūniyōyi? Waɗanda suke kusanka, gā su cikin duhun rūdāni: Inā ƙyalƙyalin sāfiyar haɗuwa da kai, yā kai abun bēgen dūniyōyi? Jikin zāɓāɓɓunka suna konce suna shēƙa bisa turɓuwa mai nīsa: Inā tēkun kasancēwarka, yā kai mai wadātar da dūniyōyi? Gā hannuwa māsu rōƙo nā nufa wajen samāniyar alfarmarka da karāmarka: Inā ruwan alhērinka, yā kai da kake ƙāyatar da dūniyōyi?
